participant_1.background:
I make time for my favorite hobbies, which include hiking and reading.
I do my best to be a good parent, but it's not always easy.
My rock collection is my favorite thing in the world.
I have a soccer ball in my baby's nursery.
i am from georgia.

participant_2.background:
I take my dog on hiking trips up volcanoes, and he loves the challenge!
i look down on people who did not.
I'm a klutz, but I'm still proud of my comic book collection.
i have never done drugs because i do not know where to buy them.
i have two dogs , one pitbull and old english bulldog.

content.text: Hi, I'm from Georgia! What about you?
I've heard California is beautiful. I've always wanted to go hiking there.
You should! It's amazing. I take my dog on hiking trips up volcanoes, and he loves the challenge!
That sounds like so much fun! I'm not sure I'm brave enough to hike up a volcano, but maybe I'll give it a try.
You should! It's really not that bad. And it's so worth it when you get to the top and see the view.
I'll have to keep that in mind. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! What are some of your favorite hobbies?
I love hiking, reading, and collecting rocks.
Hiking sounds like a lot of fun. I've never been much of a reader, but I do love collecting things. I have a big collection of comic books.
That's awesome! I've never been much of a comic book fan, but I can definitely appreciate the art.
Thanks! I'm pretty proud of it. What's your favorite thing about hiking?
I love the feeling of being outdoors and exploring new places. I also love the challenge of hiking up a mountain.
Those are both great reasons to love hiking! I definitely agree.
I'm glad we agree. I think we'd be good hiking buddies.
I think so too! We should go hiking together sometime.
